article_title: Join the fight for health care in Bevin v. Beshear, round two
article_text:
Horse park commission votes for a new director

Lafayette sweeps top seeds to win district title

00:40

article_metadata.title: Join the fight for health care in Bevin v. Beshear, round two | Lexington Herald-Leader

og.description: While launching the Save Kentucky Healthcare campaign, former Gov. Steve Beshear proclaimed this month that he could not “sit idly by” and allow health care to be taken away from families that desperately need it “without a fight.”
og.title: Join the fight for health care in Bevin v. Beshear, round two
